entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as having died in an accident or blunder, and his death is being discussed by Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is speaking to the Hall about Cedric's death and mentioning Harry Potter.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned by Dumbledore as someone who must be connected with Cedric's death, and he is described as showing bravery in returning Cedric's body to Hogwarts.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned as the one Harry Potter managed to escape from.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as being at the Slytherin table with Draco Malfoy and Goyle.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is mentioned as muttering something to Crabbe and Goyle.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as being at the Slytherin table with Draco Malfoy and Crabbe.

relationships.description: Dumbledore mentions Cedric's death in connection with Harry Potter.
Dumbledore mentions Harry Potter as someone connected to Cedric's death.
Harry Potter is described as returning Cedric's body to Hogwarts.
Dumbledore mentions that Harry Potter managed to escape from Lord Voldemort.
Draco Malfoy is mentioned as muttering something to Crabbe and Goyle.
